text: University Schools is the former lab school affiliated with the University of Northern Colorado. It is now a charter school in Greeley, Colorado. This was a relatively small school, but due to recent additions, including a new middle school, the school size has grown significantly. University Schools is home of the Bulldogs and is a K-12 school. ==References== ==External links== * Notable graduates: Spencer Bradley (Class of 2014), Brittany Whitney (Class of 2014) Category:Charter schools in Colorado Category:Greeley, Colorado Category:Laboratory schools in the United States Category:University of Northern Colorado Category:Schools in Weld County, Colorado
title: University Schools
